Keywords: Excalibur , Spy , X-Men
Real Name: Trinary
Special Powers
PLEASE DON'T BLOW HER UP: When establishing themed teams, you may choose a friendly character with the Robot keyword of 50 points or less. That character doesn't count against themed teams.
FINESSE TECHNOPATHY: Outwit. When Trinary uses it, she may count range and draw lines of fire from a friendly character with the Robot keyword.
